schools.name: Algonquin Road Elementary School
schools.school-summary: Algonquin Road Elementary School, a public school located in Fox River Grove, IL, serves grades PK-4 in the Fox River Grove Cons School District 3.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 4 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
schools.district-name: Fox River Grove Cons School District 3
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Fox River Grove Middle School
schools.school-summary: Fox River Grove Middle School, a public school located in Fox River Grove, IL, serves grades 5-8 in the Fox River Grove Cons School District 3.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 4 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
